summary.para: Gets the number of color palettes defined by the font.

returns.para: The return value is zero if the font has no color information. Color fonts are required to define at least one palette, with palette index zero reserved as the default palette.

summary.para: Gets color values from the font's color palette.

param.name: colorPaletteIndex
param.para: Zero-based index of the color palette. If the font does not have a palette with the specified index, the method returns DWRITE_E_NOCOLOR.

param.name: firstEntryIndex
param.para: Zero-based index of the first palette entry to read.

param.name: entryCount
param.para: Number of palette entries to read.

param.name: paletteEntries
param.para: Array that receives the color values.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The sum of firstEntryIndex and entryCount is greater than the actual number of palette entries that's returned by the method.
The font doesn't have a palette with the specified palette index.

summary.para: Get the number of entries in each color palette.

returns.para: The number of entries in each color palette. All color palettes in a font have the same number of palette entries. The return value is zero if the font has no color information.

summary.para: Determines the recommended text rendering and grid-fit mode to be used based on the font, size, world transform, and measuring mode.

param.name: fontEmSize
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Logical font size in DIPs.

param.name: dpiX
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Number of pixels per logical inch in the horizontal direction.

param.name: dpiY
param.para: Type: FLOAT
Number of pixels per logical inch in the vertical direction.

param.name: transform
param.para: Type: const *
A structure that describes the world transform.

param.name: isSideways
param.para: Type: BOOL
Specifies whether the font is sideways. TRUE if the font is sideways; otherwise, FALSE.

param.name: outlineThreshold
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the quality of the graphics system's outline rendering, affects the size threshold above which outline rendering is used.

param.name: measuringMode
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the method used to measure during text layout. For proper glyph spacing, this method returns a rendering mode that is compatible with the specified measuring mode.

param.name: renderingParams
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a interface for the rendering parameters object. This parameter is necessary in case the rendering parameters object overrides the rendering mode.

param.name: renderingMode
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value for the recommended rendering mode.

param.name: gridFitMode
param.para: Type: *
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value for the recommended grid-fit mode.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Allows you to determine if a color rendering path is potentially necessary.

returns.para: Returns TRUE if a color rendering path is potentially necessary.

summary.para: Represents an absolute reference to a font face. This interface contains font face type, appropriate file references, and face identification data. It adds the ability to check whether a color rendering path is potentially necessary.
This interface extends . Various font data such as metrics, names, and glyph outlines are obtained from IDWriteFontFace.
